meanings.sent1: The random scribbles on the paper were nonmeaningful.
meanings.sent2: The blank stare on his face was nonmeaningful to me.
meanings.sent3: The nonmeaningful doodles on the margins made the teacher chuckle.
meanings.sent4: Her nonmeaningful response left me feeling lost in a sea of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The nonmeaningful symbols on the ancient artifact puzzled the archaeologists.

meanings.definition: Not conveying any meaning or message.
meanings.sent1: The jumbled words formed a nonmeaningful sentence.
meanings.sent2: The static on the radio made the song nonmeaningful.
meanings.sent3: His nonmeaningful gestures during the play made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The broken compass gave us a nonmeaningful direction to follow.
meanings.sent5: The garbled message was nonmeaningful and impossible to decipher.
